summary:
Webmail is an email service you can access through your internet browser, like Chrome or Firefox. It's different from email programs you download onto your computer. Many internet providers offer webmail as part of their service.

The big benefit of webmail is convenience. You can check your email from any device with a browser, so you're not tied to one computer. This makes it easy to stay connected and manage your messages from anywhere.
title: Webmail
